function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of coffee yarn and silver nanotechnology in the face mask","Impact":"Potential allergic reactions or sensitivities to the materials","Mitigation":"Provide clear labeling of materials used and include instructions for a patch test before use","Technologies":"Allergen testing methods, clear material labeling","People":"Consumers with allergies or skin sensitivities","Owner":"Manufacturers, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Reuse of the mask filter without proper cleaning or replacement","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and reduced filtration efficiency","Mitigation":"Provide clear instructions for filter replacement and cleaning, possibly with a reminder system","Technologies":"Removable filter design, reminder system","People":"Users of the face mask","Owner":"Manufacturers, retailers"},{"Description":"Antimicrobial face mask becoming a potential source of viral transmission if not handled properly","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission if mask is contaminated or not handled and stored properly","Mitigation":"Provide guidelines for proper handling, storage, and cleaning of the mask","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coating, storage guidelines","People":"Users of the face mask","Owner":"Manufacturers, public health authorities"}]}
